data.title: Andre Marquet on LinkedIn: #productizedconference #innovation #productmanagement #partnership…
data.meta_description:
🚀 Renewal of Strategic Partnership until 2025!

I'm thrilled to announce that PRODUCTIZED and Cofidis Portugal have renewed their strategic partnership for…
data.text:
The deadline to submit your entry for the FTE EMEA Innovate Awards is this Friday! Don't miss the opportunity to be part of the region’s largest and most respected innovation competition at the epicentre of the upcoming FTE EMEA and Ancillary & Retailing events, co-located in Dublin on 11-13 June. The awards will celebrate the best air transport industry innovations from across Europe, Middle East and Africa. Industry stakeholders will pitch on-stage in an effort to impress our judges and audience, whose all-important votes will decide who wins. Whether you’re an airline, airport, established vendor or startup, we want to hear from you. The three categories are: 🏆 Best New CX Concept (open to vendors and startups only) 🏆 Most Innovative Airline Initiative (open to airlines only) 🏆 Most Innovative Airport Initiative (open to airports only) Don't miss this unparalleled opportunity to highlight your innovations, gain significant PR, and explore new business prospects. Click here to view the criteria and make your submission >> https://lnkd.in/eYdQNS8R

We are delighted to share that Dr. Geeta Nathan, Deputy Director of Innovation Ecosystems Strategy at Innovate UK, will be speaking at our upcoming National Chartered Director Conference. 📣 Geeta’s key responsibility is to look across the innovation ecosystem to join up the key players to ensure Innovate UK and its partners are maximising impact on business innovation, with particular focus on how the ecosystems that supports early-stage science and technology start-ups and spin-outs. Join us on Thursday 13 June at Nissan, Sunderland, one of the UK's longstanding advanced manufacturing success stories, and witness first-hand how their pioneering investments have built factories of the future, transformed facilities, and upskilled its workforce. The Conference is open to all chartered directors and IoD members who are enrolled on the Certificate or Diploma in Company Direction and are on the journey to CDir. ⭐ Plus, we encourage CDirs to sponsor a director of tomorrow and bring a guest. Find out more and register here: ➡ https://lnkd.in/eFeHR2Aq 🌟 NOTES TO CONSIDER: There will be an evening reception at Malmaison hotel, Newcastle after the days event should you wish to join us. Return transport from central Newcastle will be provided, there is also ample parking on site at Nissan should you wish to drive direct. For those seeking accommodation for this event, special rates for Institute of Directors (IoD) delegates are available. #professionaldevelopment #networking #boardofdirectors #careergrowth #innovation #leadership #northeast #productivity

Another major event of the industry is coming up: 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡 𝐄𝐮𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐞 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟑! 🚀 The upcoming AutoTech Europe 2023 is poised to be one of the significant events in the automotive technology industry. Formerly known as TU-Automotive Europe for over two decades, this event is not just a rebranding, but also a reimagining of the possibilities and potential of the industry. With the new name, AutoTech: Europe, it's clear that this gathering aims to set the stage for the future of 𝒂𝒖𝒕𝒐𝒎𝒐𝒕𝒊𝒗𝒆 𝒕𝒆𝒄𝒉𝒏𝒐𝒍𝒐𝒈𝒚 across the continent. AutoTech: Europe is more than just a gathering of industry professionals; it's a 𝒄𝒐𝒍𝒍𝒂𝒃𝒐𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒗𝒆 𝒑𝒍𝒂𝒕𝒇𝒐𝒓𝒎 designed to reshape the industry's trajectory. The primary objective is to foster innovative thinking and strategies that will ensure participants stay at the forefront of the automotive technology landscape. In addition to preserving and enhancing their current positions, the event encourages attendees to explore new avenues of innovation. What sets AutoTech: Europe apart is its unwavering commitment to 𝒌𝒏𝒐𝒘𝒍𝒆𝒅𝒈𝒆 𝒔𝒉𝒂𝒓𝒊𝒏𝒈 and 𝒍𝒆𝒂𝒓𝒏𝒊𝒏𝒈. Networking is a crucial aspect of the event, but it goes beyond simple socializing. The emphasis is on exchanging ideas, insights, and expertise, allowing attendees to gain a deeper understanding of the evolving automotive tech landscape. This year’s agenda is packed around software-defined-vehicles, new revenue models and platform topics. Participating in this prestigious event, we are proud to not only be representing Starfish, but also COVESA with regard to 𝑰𝒏-𝑽𝒆𝒉𝒊𝒄𝒍𝒆 𝑪𝒐𝒎𝒎𝒆𝒓𝒄𝒆 and 𝑰𝒏-𝑽𝒆𝒉𝒊𝒄𝒍𝒆 𝑷𝒂𝒚𝒎𝒆𝒏𝒕. We believe that our contributions to these areas are shaping the future of automotive technology. If you're planning to attend AutoTech: Europe and want to get to know us better, 𝒅𝒐𝒏'𝒕 𝒉𝒆𝒔𝒊𝒕𝒂𝒕𝒆 𝒕𝒐 𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒄𝒉 𝒐𝒖𝒕. We welcome the opportunity to connect and engage with like-minded professionals who share our passion for innovation and excellence. You can find the contact information in the comments section; we look forward to meeting you at this exciting event! 📍 Where? Berlin, Germany 📅 When? From November 15 to 16 #Fintech #automotive #ecommerce #payment

🌎 Exciting News: Expanding our Global Reach 🇵🇹 Consolidating a significant milestone for Just In Case through a new international journey… Portugal! This collaboration represents a profound commitment to fostering innovation, growth and determination in the global marketplace. We are proud to join forces with our esteemed Portuguese partners, Worten Portugal of the SONAE Group who together with Just In Case, will pave the way for new opportunities, expanding our horizons and expertise. Today, JUST IN CASE is partnered with major international companies that have believed in, identified and differentiated us from those that claim to share our product category. With unique business development formats, innovative processes and a focus not solely on the product but on the brand and what we makes us different, in just 3 years, Just In Case has grown and is now a proud, international company with a multi-million dollar net worth. This joint venture wouldn’t have been possible without the dedication and hard work of our incredible teams on both sides, it's a pleasure to work beside such a committed team! For any interested parties, please don't hesitate to contact me to discuss potential development options. Gianantonio Bannò Andrea Bernabini Anton Zlotnik Miguel Franco Silva Francesca Tufanio Laura Vacondio Giorgia Modonesi Diego Ziliani #globalpartnership #internationalexpansion #jointventure

The countdown is officially on! We're just one week away from the highly anticipated 7th Annual Pricing Strategy World Summit and excitement is building! Get ready to join industry leaders, innovators, and visionaries from around the globe as we come together to explore the latest trends, strategies, and insights shaping our industry today. From engaging roundtables to inspiring presentations, this summit promises to be an event like no other. Some of the distinguished speakers joining us include: José Vela, Beau Helbert, Noël Wang, Xavier Calero Molluna, Jürgen Liebert, Konstantin Kölsch, Jamie Boothroyd, Steffen Rohwer, Ji-Hoon Dierckx, Dmitrii Kovshov, Rafał Janaczek, Iván Navarro Siguero, Pedro Piccoli Soares, Gabor Kapus, Michel Safi, Daniel Meyer, Jean-Manuel Izaret (JMI), Bengi Turkel, Nazar Lukasevych, Fernando Ventureira, Dr. Yola Engler, Mårten Hedberg, Maja Perkovic, Agnes, Igor Mocevic, Debashis Kar, Holger Herbst, plus many more… Are you ready to elevate your knowledge, expand your network, and be part of the conversation shaping the future of our industry? Don't miss out! Secure your spot today and join us at the 7th Annual Pricing Strategy World Summit next week! 📆💡 Visit the website to download the brochure and register: pricingworld.ardensi.com Platinum Partners: Zilliant, PricingOne Gold Partners: Boston Consulting Group (BCG), Syncron, Stratence Partners Silver Partner: PROS, Minderest, Revenue.ai For sponsorship inquiries contact Vaishali Popat at vaishali.popat@ardensi.com For ticket inquiries, contact Aqsa Kiran Khan at aqsa.khan@ardensi.com For speaking inquiries, contact Christopher Mitchell at christopher.mitchell@ardensi.com #pricingstrategy #pricingoptimization #pricinganalysis #pricingexcellence

📣 We are thrilled to welcome Dr. Geeta Nathan, Deputy Director of Innovation Ecosystems Strategy at Innovate UK, as our speaker at this year's Chartered Director Conference. 📣 Dr Nathan's key responsibility is to look across the innovation ecosystem to join up the key players to ensure Innovate UK and its partners are maximising impact on business innovation, with particular focus on how that supports early-stage science and technology start-ups and spin-outs. Join us on Thursday 13 June at Nissan, Sunderland, a beacon of advanced manufacturing excellence in the UK. Discover how Nissan's forward thinking investments have revolutionised facilities, setting new standards ain manufacturing and workforce development. The Conference is open to all chartered directors and IoD members who are enrolled on the Certificate or Diploma in Company Direction and are on the journey to CDir. ⭐ Plus, we encourage CDirs to sponsor a director of tomorrow and bring a guest. Find out more and register here: ➡ https://lnkd.in/eFeHR2Aq 🌟 NOTES TO CONSIDER: There will be an evening reception at Malmaison hotel, Newcastle after the days event should you wish to join us. Return transport from central Newcastle will be provided, there is also ample parking on site at Nissan should you wish to drive direct. For those seeking accommodation for this event, special rates for Institute of Directors (IoD) delegates are available. #professionaldevelopment #networking #boardofdirectors #careergrowth #innovation #leadership #northeast #productivity
